name: BloodGroupAntibodyScreen
title: Blood Group Antibody Screen
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent the performance of blood group antibody screening procedures.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use Quality Data Model (QDM) related to the Laboratory, Result or Laboratory, Order datatype.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with procedures for blood group antibody screen procedures done on serum or plasma.),(Exclusion Criteria: Specifically excludes cord blood, blood product units, donor, and autologous.)
